comment.author: 82452447@N00
comment._content: The Valley of Jehoshaphat is a Biblical place mentioned in Joel 3:2 and Joel 3:12: "I will gather together all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat, and will plead with them there for my people, and for my heritage Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations and parted my land." "Let the heathen be wakened and come up to the Valley of Jehoshaphat, for there will I sit to judge all the heathen round about."
